00001 #include <HardwareSerial.h>   //if you're not in the main sketch, you have to include this to let you use Serial functions
00002 #include <string.h>
00003 
00004 int getByte(int timeout)
00005 {
00006   int currentTime=millis();
00007   int maxTime=currentTime+timeout;
00008   while((Serial.available()==0)&&(millis()<(maxTime)))
00009     {}
00010   if((millis()>maxTime)||(Serial.available()==0))
00011     return -1;
00012   else
00013     return Serial.read();
00014 }
